attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: LIFE SHOULD MEAN LIFE FOR THE MINDLESS PEOPLE, MORE SO YOUNGSTERS, THAT KILL INNOCENT PEOPLE FOR THINGS LIKE NOT GIVING THEM A CIGARETTE OR MORE RECENTLY A BOTTLE OF WINE. EVEN TODAY A FATHER OF A THREE YEAR OLD CHILD WAS AT A BUS STOP ON HIS WAY TO HOSPITAL TO SEE HIS NEWBORN CHILD AND HE WAS MURDERED IN FRONT OF HIS CHILD. HIS NEWBORN CHILD WILL NEVER SEE ITS FATHER THANKS TO SOME SAD EXCUSE FOR A HUMAN

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
